func_sig.description: Calculate the result of modulo operation for a given number and modulus.
func_sig.name: modular_arithmetic

func_sig.description: Convert a decimal number to a specified base and return it as a string.
func_sig.name: decimal_to_base

base.description: The base to convert to (e.g., 2 for binary, 4 for base four).

number.description: The decimal number to be converted.

func_sig.description: Convert any decimal number to a specified base and return the result as a string representation.
func_sig.name: convert_decimal_to_base_general

base.description: The base to convert to (minimum base is 2).

number.description: The decimal number to be converted.
